Introduction

NeonPunch was a five-member girl group under A100 Entertainment. They debuted on June 27, 2018, with the single "Moonlight". They officially disbanded on August 11, 2020, with the remaining three members to re-debut in A100 Entertainment's new group, XUM, in September 2020.
